duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct political science research using quantitative methods and analysis.
Teach courses in political science, with a focus on mass media, social media, political communication, and public opinion in the United States.
Collaborate with the College’s Social Science Research Lab (SSRL) to develop new courses and certificate programs at the undergraduate and graduate levels.
Provide scholarly publications and research contributions within the field of political science.
Work collaboratively with the department and the SSRL to support the growth and development of the academic community.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Political Science or related discipline (required)
